product.title: Cinderella’s Busy Birthday | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Cinderella’s Busy Birthday

The story of Cinderella has enchanted young readers around the world for centuries. In this imaginative prequel, it’s Cinderella’s birthday. It should be a day for celebration, gifts, and joy, but Cinderella’s mean-spirited, lazy stepmother and stepsisters attempt to spoil her special day by giving her an extra-long list of chores. Their plan backfires when Cinderella’s chores are completed in record time, thanks to the help of her loyal mice friends.

Tie-in Activity: Brainstorm with your child to develop a list of ways to make someone feel special on their birthday. Focus on specific acts of kindness, such as pitching in to help with chores, making a meaningful, homemade card, or surprising someone with their favorite meal or dessert.
